import * as request from "../../utils/request"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import "./payment.css"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Payment(){ const [infoProductOrder, setInfoProductOrder] = useState([]); const handleGetInfoProductOrder = () => { console.log(parseInt(localStorage.getItem('auth_matk'))) const conditionToGetProductOrder = { matk: parseInt(localStorage.getItem('auth_matk')) } request.get("/api/infoProductOrder",conditionToGetProductOrder) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); setInfoProductOrder(res.data.data); }) } useEffect(()=> { handleGetInfoProductOrder(); },[]); return (
